name: Soulsteal
description:
Made in two days for the MiniJam 128 - Heart

IMPORTANT: HIT F11 (fullscren mode) BEFORE ENTERING THE GAME (on the menu) OR THE GAME RESOLUTION WILL BUG

Will be fixed after the jam period ends

.

What is Soulsteal

Soulsteal is a game where you cannot get hurt! Your character is a vampire and the goal is to gain enough souls to endure the day.

Every monster you kill will give you hearts that help you progress towards that night's goal
Get enough before the night is out to not burn in day time

.

Enemies

Heartkeeper [2HP] - Basic enemy that drops half a heart

Illusioner [4HP] - Spawns 4 decoys, kill the right one or it will dissapear. Can be killed instantly if you have 4+ damage

Soul Eater [8HP] - Eats the spare hearts entering a rage state.

.

Controls

[W, A, S, D, arrows] to Move

[Click] to use your whip

[E] to open the Grim Reaper's soul shop

[1, 2, 3, 4, 5] to upgrade perks in the Grim Reaper's soul shop

[Esc] - Main menu

In Menu [Arrows] to move

In Menu [Space] to select

.
